controls.label: Label
controls.helpExpression: A label can provide a human-readable id for model objects that have assigned ids that might be less readable

controls.label: IRI
controls.helpExpression: This is the model-assigned element identifier. Every model element has this unique identifier

controls.label: Name
controls.helpExpression: Lists zero or more model types that this instance specializes. Such supertypes carry inherited properties or relations in the model.
